## Checklist
- [ ] Tests pass (`npm test` + `cargo test`)
- [ ] TypeScript compiles (`npx tsc --noEmit`)
- [ ] Clippy passes (`cargo clippy -- -D warnings`)
- [ ] Commit messages follow conventional commits
- [ ] Breaking changes marked with `!` in commit prefix
